Reviews.Title: NEVER GOT TO USE

Reviews.Content: NEVER GOT TO TRY THE PRODUCT SEAMS OK HOWEVER USED THE END ON A COMPUTER PLUG IN IT GREAT SO I DID THE BEST REVIEW POSSABLE!!!!!
